content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello, Mister Wang. I'm pleased to have the opportunity to discuss the rental price of my apartment with you. I'm sure we can reach an agreement that satisfies both parties. How much are you willing to pay for the apartment?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I'd like to propose a rental price of 800 Euro per month for the apartment. Would this be acceptable to you?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but 800 Euro per month is not enough for me. I'm looking for a higher price to reflect the quality of the apartment and its location. Would you be willing to increase your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood, Mister Schmidt. I'm flexible with the price. How about 900 Euro per month? I believe this is a fair offer considering the apartment's condition and location. Would you agree to this price?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: 900 Euro per month is closer to my expectations, but I'm still looking for a higher offer. The apartment is brand new and in the city center, which usually commands a higher rent. Would you be willing to go up to 1000 Euro per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your request for 1000 Euro per month is quite high. While I understand the apartment's appeal, I must consider my budget as a student. I'm willing to negotiate, but I would like to propose 950 Euro per month. This would be a fair compromise, in my opinion. What do you think?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: As a landlord, I have to ensure that I'm getting a fair price for my property. 950 Euro per month is still lower than what I believe the apartment is worth, but I'm willing to consider it. Would you be willing to sign a long-term lease, perhaps two years, to secure the apartment at this price?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I'm open to discussing the lease term. However, I'm not sure if I can commit to a two-year lease as a student. Would you be willing to accept a one-year lease with an option to renew? This would give me some flexibility in my studies and future plans. As for the price, I'm willing to compromise and meet you at 975 Euro per month, inclusive of all utilities. This would be a fair deal for both parties. What is your response?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: A one-year lease with an option to renew is acceptable to me. As for the price, 975 Euro per month inclusive of all utilities is not sufficient for me to agree to the lease term. I would need to reconsider my options. If you are willing to increase your offer to 1000 Euro per month, I would be more inclined to proceed with the one-year lease with an option to renew.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, Mister Schmidt. Let me consider your request. TERMINATE
name: Haoyu Wang from China
